enWisdom: The righteous act is an action that reforms
The righteous act is a good deed
Righteousness is the quickest in acquiring reward
The good deed that brings the quickest reward is piety
Verily the good act that brings reward quickest is the act of kindness

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْبِرِّ مَا أُصِيبَ بِهِ أَهْلُهُ
enWisdom: The best act is that which benefits those who are deserving of it

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْبِرِّ مَا أُصِيبَ بِهِ الْأَبْرَارُ
enWisdom: The best act is that which benefits the pious ones

Wisdom: بَادِرِ الْبِرَّ فَإِنَّ أَعْمَالَ الْبِرِّ فُرْصَةٌ
enWisdom: Hasten towards virtue, for verily virtuous deeds are an opportunity [to secure your Hereafter]
Hastening to perform righteous acts increases [one’s] righteousness
Consolidation of good is in [performing] virtuous actions
One whose righteousness increases is praised

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ جَمِيلُهُ أَجْمَعَ النَّاسُ عَلَى تَفْضِيلِهِ
enWisdom: One whose beautiful actions increase, the people unite in elevating him
One whose righteousness is close [at hand], his reputation goes far [and wide]
Whoever extends his righteousness, his renown spreads

Wisdom: مَنْ بَذَلَ مَعْرُوفَهُ مَالَتْ إِلَيْهِ الْقُلُوبُ
enWisdom: Whoever extends his benevolence [to others], the hearts become inclined towards him
With righteousness, mercy flows forth abundantly

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا طَبَائِعُ الْأَبْرَارِ طَبَائِعُ مُحْتَمِلَةٌ لِلْخَيْرِ فَمَهْمَا حُمِّلَتْ [تحمل‏] مِنْهُ احْتَمَلَتْهُ
enWisdom: Verily only the dispositions of the virtuous are dispositions that have the potential of supporting good, so whenever they are laden with it, they carry it

Wisdom: نُفُوسُ الْأَبْرَارِ [الْأَخْيَارِ] نَافِرَةٌ مِنْ نُفُوسِ الْأَشْرَارِ
enWisdom: The souls of the virtuous are averse to the souls of the wicked
The souls of the virtuous are repulsed by the actions of the wicked
